metadata.Title: CVE-2013-1833 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the File Picker module in Moodle 2.x through 2.1.10, 2.2.x before 2.2.8, 2.3.x before 2.3.5, and 2.4.x before 2.4.2 allow remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted filename.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
